column1: Table 3: Number of sentenced prisoners admitted into state prisons, by type of admission, 2000-2009
Authors: Heather C. West, Ph.D., William J. Sabol, Ph.D., and Sarah J. Greenman
Table 3. Number of sentenced prisoners admitted into state prisons, by type of admission, 2000-2009
a/Totals based on inmates with a sentence of more than 1 year. Totals exclude transfers, escapes, and those absent without leave (AWOL).
b/Parole violators include prisoners with revoked parole, other conditional release violators, and intermediate sanctions imposed in lieu of revocation.
